DOCNAME: CASE OF DİNÇER AND OTHERS v. TURKEY
JUDGES: András Sajó;David Thór Björgvinsson;Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and lived in LOC .

CARDINAL . In DATE ORG of Highways seized a plot of land belonging to the applicants without any formal expropriation , for the construction of a highway . The applicants brought an action before ORG to obtain compensation for the de facto expropriation of their property . They requested MONEY ( TRY ) as compensation from the court and reserved their right to increase this claim in due course .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicants TRY CARDINAL as compensation for the de facto expropriation of their land , as requested , plus interest . The applicants initiated execution proceedings before ORG to obtain that amount ( file no . CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of the first - instance court .

CARDINAL . The applicants subsequently brought an additional action ( “ ek dava ” ) before ORG to obtain further compensation for their land in the light of the expert report obtained during the previous proceedings , which had valued the land at a rate higher than that initially requested by them .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicants TRY PERSON , plus interest . The applicants initiated another set of execution proceedings before ORG to obtain the amount awarded ( file no . CARDINAL ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of ORG , however reduced the amount awarded to the applicants to TRY CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the administration paid TRY CARDINAL and CARDINAL respectively to the files before ORG . According to the information provided by the applicants , there has been no debt outstanding in the execution files .
